Busa, ma ọ bụ ikpoya  Bisã, Busa bụ asụsụ Mande nke Bussa Emirate mbụ na Naịjirịa
A na-akpọ ya Busanci na Hausa, a na-akpọkwa ya Zugweya.

Asụsụ Busa nwere mkpụrụedemede ịrị atọ na abụọ (Aa, Ãã, Bb, Cc, Dd, Ee, Ee, Ɛɛ, Ɛ̃ɛ̃, Ff, Gg, Hh, Ii, I, I, Jj, Kk, Ll, Mm, Nn, Nn, Oo Ɔɔ, Ɔ̃ɔ̃, Pp, Rr, Ss, Tt, Uu, Uũ, Vv, Ww, Y gwy, Zz) na digraphs iri abụọ na ise gbara mkpi (Aa aa, Ãa ãa, Ee ee, Ẽe ẽe, Ɛɛ ɛɛ, Ɛ̃ɛ ɛ̃ɛ, Gb gb, Ii ii, Ĩi ĩi, Kp kp, Oo oo, Ɔ̃ɔ ɔ̃ɔ, Uu uu, Ũu ũu, gw, mb, mp, nd, ng, nk, ns, nt, nz).
Eji uda olu emekwaỤda olu dị elu na ụda olu dị ala na-eji olu dị ala (Iwu).
